issue_title: ActiveSupport::Cache.expand_cache_key sometimes returns falsely same key in parallel tests
summary: This is the official repository for the Ruby on Rails web application framework, which follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern. It includes everything needed to create database-backed web applications and comes with several libraries and frameworks such as Active Record, Action Mailer, Action Mailbox, Active Job, Action Cable, Active Storage, Action Text, and Active Support. The repository also includes Getting Started guidelines and documentation.
